selected_quotes: Paper from Dr. Boris Nemzer. #Antioxidant Activity of #Spices and Their Impact on Human Health: A Review

citation.abstract: Antioxidants are substances that prevent oxidation of other compounds or neutralize free radicals. Spices and herbs are rich sources of antioxidants. They have been used in food and beverages to enhance flavor, aroma and color. Due to their excellent antioxidant activity, spices and herbs have also been used to treat some diseases. In this review article, the chemical composition and antioxidant activity of spices and culinary herbs are presented. The content of flavonoids and total polyphenols in different spices and herbs are summarized. The applications of spices and their impacts on human health are briefly described. The extraction and analytical methods for determination of antioxidant capacity are concisely reviewed.
citation.title: Antioxidant Activity of Spices and Their Impact on Human Health: A Review

author.name: Christian Kirchhoff
author.description: Christian Kirchhoff: Gerne Ihr Figurwechselberater für alle Fragen um die Ernährung und Training. Ernährungsberater/Sportlehrer/Leistungssport-Bodytrainer etc.

author.name: Antioxidants_MDPI
author.description: Antioxidants (ISSN 2076-3921; CODEN: ANTIGE) provides an advanced forum for studies related to the science and technology of antioxidants.

facebook.summary:
Gewürze und Kräuter – Eine kleine Anekdote zur Geschichte, Gewicht und Gesundheit

In der Regel sind Gewürze getrocknete, aromatische Pflanzenteile von Samen, Beeren, Wurzeln, Früchten etc.

Über Jahrhunderte wurden Gewürze für Geschmack und Medizin einges
